name: Sureal pool
description:
Sureal pool is a local, 2-player versus, game of pool with a twist.

Standard rules of pool apply but with a shot timer you need to act fast.

The player who runs out of balls in their colour will lose. Your objective is to get to the final hole.

Aim with the mouse and hold Left Click to build up power, release to fire.

Press ESC to Pause.

This is another assignment from my second year of university. I was really proud of this one and may return to polish it later.
